Geoms & positions

Layout manipulation

pick() pick_at() pick_bins()

Pick seqs and bins by name or position

flip() flip_seq() flip_nicely()

Flip bins and sequences

shift()

Shift bins left/right

focus()

Focus on features and regions of interest

Read in data

Read common bioinformatics file types

read_alitv()

read an AliTV .json file this usually contains sequences, links and (optionally) genes

read_gffs()

Read .gff files

read_gffs_as_contigs()

Read genome_ids, contig_ids and contig lengths from .gff files.

read_paf()

read a .paf file (minimap/minimap2). Only the first 12 canonical columns. Ignores tagged extra fields.

Under the hood

Functions that power gggenomes under the hood. Useful for developers and power-users.

as_features()

Compute a layout for feature data

as_links()

Compute a layout for link data

as_seqs()

Compute a layout for sequence data

as_subfeatures()

Compute a layout for subfeature data

as_sublinks()

Compute a layout for links linking features

swap_if()

Swap values of two columns based on a condition

in_range()

Do numeric values fall into specified ranges?

anchor()

The virtual x-start of the full length seq in the plot

width() width0()

The width of a range

x() xend()

Project feature coordinates into layout space
